forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 44. East wind 1 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North wind 2 to 6 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the sky reveals an uninterrupted expanse of clarity, with the crispness of a winter night still lingering in the air. With temperatures gracefully dipping to around 44 degrees, the east wind breathes gently, inviting the city to awaken from its slumber. The promise of a sunny Tuesday unfurls, where temperatures are destined to rise near 59, eventually settling into a serene afternoon around 56. This is a day that encourages a light layering; a warm sweater or jacket will offer comfort against the coolness, while still allowing one to bask in the sun's gentle embrace.

The absence of fog signifies a unique opportunity to traverse the city’s bridges and hillsides, perhaps embarking on a low-key exploration of the vibrant streets of the Mission or taking a quiet stroll through Golden Gate Park. One could also indulge in the simple pleasure of a warm drink from a local café, seated outdoors, inhaling the invigorating air infused with hints of citrus and distant oceanic whispers. This Tuesday morning in San Francisco offers a canvas of tranquility, an invitation to enjoy life’s quieter moments amidst the urban tapestry.
